channel.title: The Capitalist Church of A'un
channel.description:
So the truth is out, socialism sucks. The commandments are as follows:
Thou shalt compete for dominance with thy neighbors. Thou shalt lust only for monopoly. Thou shalt fuck those socialist bitches into submission. Thou shalt only eat what thy business sells best.
I am currently transcribing the holy doctrine that has been given to me by the angel Matar. I'll get that done quickly and share it with the world (for a price, of course)

Free. However, the required inductee’s coursework requires two moderately priced books.
